CustomField.description: If both SLA's present both = 5 points each. If only first touch needed on case then it = 10 points.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(First_Touch_SLA__c, "Yes") && ISPICKVAL(Closure_SLA__c , "Yes"), 10, IF( ISPICKVAL(First_Touch_SLA__c, "Yes") && ISPICKVAL(Closure_SLA__c, "No"),5, IF( ISPICKVAL(First_Touch_SLA__c, "No") && ISPICKVAL(Closure_SLA__c, "Yes"),5, IF( ISPICKVAL(First_Touch_SLA__c, "Yes") && ISPICKVAL(Closure_SLA__c, "N/A"),10,0))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If both SLA's present both = 5 points each. If only first touch needed on case then it = 10 points.
CustomField.label: SLA Score
